Port:80

Add environment variables
HTTP_PROXY à http://www-proxy.us.oracle.com:80
HTTPS_PROXY à http://www-proxy.us.oracle.com:80

Vagrant command location:
https://app.vagrantup.com/centos/boxes/7


vagrant --version
vagrant init centos/7
vagrant up


Steps:

1. Add proxy in environment variable
2. Install vagrant oracle Vm on machine
3. Restart computer
4. Create a new folder in local drive
5. Open command prompt > navigate to the new folder
6. vagrant --version
7. vagrant init centos/7
8. vagrant up
9. vagrant status
10. vagrant ssh default
